t: 1 Chronicles 1
Genealogy from Adam
Adam,*p Seth, Enosh,
Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared,
Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
Noah, Shem, Ham and Japheth.
The*p sons of Japheth were*i Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech and Tiras.
The sons of Gomer were*i Ashkenaz, Diphath, and Togarmah.
The sons of Javan were*i Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim and Rodanim.
The*p sons of Ham were*i Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
The sons of Cush were*i Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raama and Sabteca; and the sons of Raamah were*i Sheba and Dedan.
Cush became the father of Nimrod; he began to be a mighty one in the earth.
Mizraim*p became the father of the people of Lud, Anam, Lehab, Naphtuh,
Pathrus, Casluh, from which the Philistines came, and Caphtor.
Canaan*p became the father of Sidon, his firstborn, Heth,
and the Jebusites, the Amorites, the Girgashites,
the Hivites, the Arkites, the Sinites,
the Arvadites, the Zemarites and the Hamathites.
The*p sons of Shem were*i Elam, Asshur, Arpachshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether and Meshech.
Arpachshad became the father of Shelah and Shelah became the father of Eber.
Two sons were born to Eber, the name of the one was Peleg, for in his days the earth was divided, and his brother’s name was Joktan.
Joktan became the father of Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ophir, Havilah and Jobab; all these were*i the sons of Joktan.
Shem,*p Arpachshad, Shelah,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Terah,
Abram, that is Abraham.
Descendants of Abraham
The*p sons of Abraham were*i Isaac and Ishmael.
These are their genealogies: the firstborn of Ishmael was*i Nebaioth, then Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphish and Kedemah; these were*i the sons of Ishmael.
The sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine, whom*i she bore, were*i Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan were*i Sheba and Dedan.
The sons of Midian were Ephah, Epher, Hanoch, Abida and Eldaah. All these were the sons of Keturah.
Abraham*p became the father of Isaac. The sons of Isaac were*i Esau and Israel.
The sons of Esau were*i Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam and Korah.
The sons of Eliphaz were*i Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna and Amalek.
The sons of Reuel were*i Nahath, Zerah, Shammah and Mizzah.
The sons of Seir were*i Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer and Dishan.
The sons of Lotan were*i Hori and Homam; and Lotan’s sister was*i Timna.
The sons of Shobal were*i Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon were*i Aiah and Anah.
The son of Anah was*i Dishon. And the sons of Dishon were*i Hamran, Eshban, Ithran and Cheran.
The sons of Ezer were*i Bilhan, Zaavan and Jaakan. The sons of Dishan were*i Uz and Aran.
Now*p these are the kings who reigned in the land of Edom before any king of the sons of Israel reigned. Bela was the son of Beor, and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
When Bela died, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah became king in his place.
When Jobab died, Husham of the land of the Temanites became king in his place.
When Husham died, Hadad the son of Bedad, who defeated Midian in the field of Moab, became king in his place; and the name of his city was*i Avith.
When Hadad died, Samlah of Masrekah became king in his place.
When Samlah died, Shaul of Rehoboth by the River became king in his place.
When Shaul died, Baal-hanan the son of Achbor became king in his place.
When Baal-hanan died, Hadad became king in his place; and the name of his city was Pai, and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
Then Hadad died. Now*bp the chiefs of Edom were: chief Timna, chief Aliah, chief Jetheth,
chief Oholibamah, chief Elah, chief Pinon,
chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,
chief Magdiel, chief Iram. These were*i the chiefs of Edom.
